Parameters: int: A list or bitmask of predefined category sets. Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_NONE_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_ALL_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_ANDROID_WEBVIEW_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_WEB_DEVELOPER_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_INPUT_LATENCY_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_RENDERING_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_JAVASCRIPT_AND_RENDERING_E@, and @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_FRAME_VIEWER_E@
addCategories(int...).Description: Adds predefined sets of categories to be included in the trace output. A predefined category set can be one of @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_NONE_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_ALL_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_ANDROID_WEBVIEW_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_WEB_DEVELOPER_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_INPUT_LATENCY_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_RENDERING_E@, @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_JAVASCRIPT_AND_RENDERING_E@ or @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#CATEGORIES_FRAME_VIEWER_E@.

Parameters: int: The tracing mode to use, one of @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#RECORD_UNTIL_FULL_E@ or @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#RECORD_CONTINUOUSLY_E@. Value is @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#RECORD_UNTIL_FULL_E@, or @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#RECORD_CONTINUOUSLY_E@
setTracingMode(int).Description: Sets the tracing mode for this configuration. When tracingMode is not set explicitly, the default is @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#RECORD_CONTINUOUSLY_E@.

Parameters: String: A list of category patterns. A category pattern can contain wildcards, e.g. "blink*" or full category name e.g. "renderer.scheduler".
addCategories(java.lang.String...).Description: Adds custom categories to be included in trace output. Note that the categories are defined by the currently-in-use version of WebView. They live in chromium code and are not part of the Android API. See

Parameters: Collection: A list of category patterns.
addCategories(java.util.Collection<java..Description: Adds custom categories to be included in trace output. Same as @B_android#webkit#TracingConfig#Builder#addCategories_E@ but allows to pass a Collection as a parameter.
